name: Eventide Night
description: After 999 years of praying , 'the Angel' finally come to its believer. But , she doesn't bless them as they imagine... ———— A fantastic Shooting Game 3 character * 5 chapter + hidden chapter. Easy operation + personalized skills. Pretty characters. Music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel® 1 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel® 1 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
